summary: A young girl and her coach overcome adversity to make their way into the National Australian Gymnastics Squad.
cast: Nina Pearce|Adam Tuominen|Emily Morris|Amy Handley|Carmel Johnson|Alanah Gilbert|Lilly Blacker|Hapi Murphy|Elysia Markou|Sarah Murray|Julie Kay Lumasag|David Wilson|David O'Brien|Stephen Weyland|Dean Lukin|Chris Coleman|Tamsyn Lewis|Aliante Youngdino|Cherylee Harris|Asha Lawson|Ruby-Mae Taras|Nick Buckland|Carina Gun|Janet Jauncey|Carter Hedges|Chris Remkes|Malcom Walton|Mary Blacker|Nadine Sharp|Paul Murray|Belinda White|Carleen Hough|Sharon Hayes|Tara DeVroome|Emma Murray|Ben Frick|Carly Rae Richards|Amanda Agostinelli|Shanice Seiboth|Alexa Mondello|Lauren Andris|Bonica Little|Levon Hudson|Gary Harrison|Robin Yates|Samantha Beaty|Anne Bigham|Wendy Fry|Kaye Gambling|Jackie Gartner|Kate Harrison|Mariia Lutaienko|Marsha Makarushkina|Donna Richards|Samuel F. Lee
title: A Second Chance
